column3: “I got this strain from a Collective on the Central Coast CA.  The main reason I got this was it’s amazing bag appeal.  The buds tend to be small but they look like they are covered in SNOW.  This strain is a total grinder killer, the high starts in your head and behind the eyes.  You’ll most likely feel the effects after the first smoke.  Not too heavy, I’d guess it to be 75:25 Indica dominant, so you will have some ...”

“This strain is a perfect hybrid. After smoking the high felt like I had control over the high. If I wanted sativa effects, I could have it, if I wanted indica effects, I could have it. It was mellow, but uplifting. The smell is great, even before being lit. Was a very good high, and definitely a strain I’d recommend to people for anytime of day.”

“Harvested - 12/1/17
Smoked - 5/11/18 (this makes me sad)

Beautiful light green bud with vibrant orange hairs. 

Light - airy burn with a heavy head hit very quickly. THC tested at 24.87% CBD - 0%

The name definitely comes from the way it makes you feel - double cup of lean. However, this sizzurp is better in my experience as the Siz was predominately a head high, felt plenty of energy throughout my time.”
